name: turkey
description: Tool for object annotation on Amazon's SageMaker platform

scripts.build: node minifyAppHtml.js && browserify turkey.js > bundle.js && babel bundle.js | uglifyjs > bundle.min.js && browserify helpers.js > bundleHelpers.js && babel bundleHelpers.js | uglifyjs > bundleHelpers.min.js
scripts.build-dev: node minifyAppHtml.js --dev && browserify turkey.js > bundleDev.js && babel bundleDev.js | uglifyjs > bundleDev.min.js && browserify helpers.js > bundleHelpersDev.js && babel bundleHelpersDev.js | uglifyjs > bundleHelpersDev.min.js

author: Robert C. Alfredson
